column5: Have to report that the dock fishing on Hay Bay ia alive and well.  Had the Grandsons (Les Boys) down on the dock last Wed before they headed back to the Big Smoke, The bite was "ON" as we fished off the docks at Bayview Resort.  Here's a couple of shots with a pretty big Rock Bass.  This is AJ and Grandad     This is Will and Grandad    We sure are having fun with the smaller fish as they bite a lot better than the walleyes....  Stay Tuned for the next Grandson's fishing in Mid Sept.
Great report and Pics superdad  Well done! High five to the boys! Thanks for sharing Leechman
That's just so much fun. Love the looks on the boys faces  Thank you for sharing.
Three generations in the same boat, can't beat that! Looks like you all had a great time.  Cheers, 1leg
Priceless!  A couple a great shots there Dave!  Nothing like taking some time to get the little ones into a couple of the WGSF.    Thanks for the post.
